page.title: 05QUARRIES AT EARL STERNDALE
page.content: There are four big working limestone quarries close together. { Brierlow Quarry }Peakstone Ltd { Hindlow Quarry} I.C.I { Buxton Quarry }Tarmac { Dowlow Quarry }Steetley Ltd First they remove the topsoil.Then they drill a hole and put some gelignite in and detonate it.Dumpers take the stone to be crushed.When it is crushed they use it for roadmaking or stonedust.Sometimes they burn it in a kiln to make lime.There is a lot of smoke, dust and noise.The blasting shakes the village.We can also hear the siren and the other noises.When you go up to the quarry you see signs telling you to go in a concrete shelter because stone may hit you when they blast.
